articles.title: Grok says Elon Musk is better than basically everyone, except Shohei Ohtani
articles.description: According to Grok, Elon Musk can out-slug the MLB's greatest power hitters... except Ohtani.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Google steps up AI scam protection in India, but gaps remain
articles.description: Google is expanding its real-time scam-detection and screen-sharing fraud warnings in India.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Joby Aviation makes ‘corporate espionage’ claims in lawsuit against rival Archer
articles.description: Joby alleges one of its former employees shared stolen trade secrets when he was hired by Archer.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: WhatsApp gets its own Instagram Notes-like feature
articles.description: WhatsApp users can now share their status with others through a new "About" feature.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Source: Kalshi’s valuation jumps to $11B after raising massive $1B round
articles.description: The quickly growing prediction betting market raised fresh capital from Sequoia and CapitalG, according to someone familiar with the deal.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Salesforce says some of its customers’ data was accessed after Gainsight breach
articles.description: Salesforce said it’s investigating an incident where hackers compromised some of its customers' data after breaching customer experience company
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: ChatGPT launches group chats globally
articles.description: The company sees group chats in ChatGPT as a way for people to coordinate trips, co-write documents, settle debates, or work through research
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Why these founders ditched social ads for Taylor Swift concerts and prison tablets
articles.description: Two founders share their stories on how they approached two very different markets: teens in need of well-being advice, and formerly incarcerated
articles.author: Isabelle Johannessen

articles.title: Mixup is a new, Mad Libs-style app for creating AI images from photos, text, and doodles
articles.description: The new app lets anyone use Google's Nano Banana in a fun new way, with fill-in-the-blank AI "recipes" that users can share.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Perplexity brings its AI browser Comet to Android
articles.description: Perplexity is launching its AI browser Comet on Android with an iOS version in works.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Android’s Quick Share now works with iPhone’s AirDrop, starting with the Pixel 10 lineup
articles.description: The company says the new feature will allow users to quickly share their photos, videos, and files with without worrying about the kind of phone the
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: This Khosla-backed startup can track drones, trucks, and robotaxis, inch by inch
articles.description: Point One Navigation, now valued at $230 million, is building out well beyond automotive.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: The marketing guru who helped turn Khosla Ventures into an AI powerhouse is moving on
articles.description: Daver is full of lessons for founders. Among them: "You have to repeat yourself all the time, and you have to say the same thing."
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Gemini 3 refused to believe it was 2025, and hilarity ensued
articles.description: Famed AI researcher Andrej Karpathy got early access to Google’s latest AI model and stumbled onto its "model smell."
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: YouTube tests an in-app private messaging feature again
articles.description: YouTube users who are 18 and older in Ireland and Poland can now share videos directly on the mobile app.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Blue Origin reveals a super-heavy variant of its New Glenn rocket that is taller than a Saturn V
articles.description: The nine-engine variant can carry larger payloads and more closely matches the capabilities of SpaceX's largest rocket, Starship.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Letterboxd to launch new movie rental feature in December
articles.description: Letterboxd is entering the movie rental business with a new digital video store that allows users to rent titles directly on the platform.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Gemini starts rolling out to Android Auto globally
articles.description: Gemini will replace Google Assistant and give drivers the ability to make playlists, access email, and learn about a city — all through voice.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: The best guide to spotting AI writing comes from Wikipedia
articles.description: Wikipedia's guide to “Signs of AI writing” is a great resource for learning to spot LLM-generated prose.
articles.author: Russell Brandom

articles.title: After SEC investigation, Curastory founder resigns, hires replacement
articles.description: Curastory’s founder and CEO, Tiffany Kelly, has resigned from the role and replaced herself with Dave Dickman, former CEO of the influencer marketing
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.title: Monarch Tractor preps for layoffs and warns employees it may ‘shut down’
articles.description: The memo that went out Thursday, which TechCrunch obtained, says the "timing" of the company's pivot away from tractor manufacturing puts it at risk.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane
